data.title: Central Michigan University
data.meta_description: Marcus Badgett (31) Defensive Back - 2023 As a redshirt freshman defensive back, saw action in 10 games both on defense and on special teams … started two ga...
data.text:
2023

As a redshirt freshman defensive back, saw action in 10 games both on defense and on special teams … started two games at cornerback … concluded season with nine tackles (nine solo), with two pass breakups, and an interception for 13-yard return … made one solo tackle at Western Michigan (11/7) … finished with a career-high three tackles (three solo) with a pass breakup vs. Northern Illinois (10/31) … intercepted pass, returned it 13 yards, finished with a solo tackle vs. Akron (10/14) … made one tackle at Buffalo (10/7) … broke up a pass, made one tackle in start vs. Eastern Michigan (9/30) … made first career start South Alabama (9/23) … finished with two solo tackles at Notre Dame (9/16) … saw action in season opener vs. Michigan State (9/1) and vs. New Hampshire (9/9).

2022

Saw action in two games on special teams and as a defensive back … played in 32 plays on special teams on year … saw action at South Alabama (9/10) and Oklahoma State (9/1).

2021 AT TYLER JUNIOR COLLEGE

Attended Tyler Junior College.

2020 AT CISCO COLLEGE

Saw action in seven games at defensive back … made five tackles (four solo) on the year.

HIGH SCHOOL

A 2020 graduate of Red Oak High School in Red Oak, Texas … named second team All-District as a junior … two-year starter … played wide receiver and cornerback … also competed in track and field in the 110-meter hurdles.

PERSONAL

Born Marcus Badgett on June 29, 2002.
